pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:5.1: 5. The training rule on cleaning with water
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying in the Sakyan country at Kapilavatthu in the Banyan Tree Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.2: At that time Mahāpajāpati Gotamī went to the Buddha, bowed, and, standing downwind from him, she said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.5: “Well, let the nuns clean themselves with water.” The Master then instructed, inspired, and gladdened her with a teaching,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.6: after which she bowed down, circumambulated him with her right side toward him, and left.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.7: Soon afterwards the Master gave a teaching to the monks and said:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.8: “Monks, I allow the nuns to clean themselves with water.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.9: Soon afterwards, being aware that the Master had allowed cleaning with water,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.10: a nun did it too deeply and she caused a sore in her vagina.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.1: She told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.3: “How can a nun clean herself too deeply with water?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.7: “How can a nun clean herself too deeply with water?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:8.1: ‘If a nun cleans herself with water, she may insert two finger-joints at the most. If she goes beyond that, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:9.2: washing the vagina is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:11.1: She may insert two finger-joints at the most:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:11.2: she may insert two joints of two fingers at the most.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:12.2: if she consents to the contact and goes beyond even by a hair’s breadth, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:13.1: If it is more than two finger-joints, and she perceives it as more, and she inserts them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:13.2: If it is more than two finger-joints, but she is unsure if it is, and she inserts them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:13.3: If it is more than two finger-joints, but she perceives it as less, and she inserts them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:14.1: If it is less than two finger-joints, but she perceives it as more, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:14.2: If it is less than two finger-joints, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:14.3: If it is less than two finger-joints, and she perceives it as less, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:15.3: if she inserts less than two finger-joints;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:15.4: if she does it because of sickness;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:15.6: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:16.1: The fifth training rule is finished.
